title: Beard alphabet
content:
[by Tim Yarzhombeck](http://web.archive.org/web/20080413034601/http:/timbeck.livejournal.com/559023.html)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080413034601im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/beardalphabet_4396.jpg)

 [‹ Looking for examples of comedic typography (movies etc)](http://web.archive.org/web/20080413034601/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44030 "Go to previous forum topic") ["Procedural Typography" ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080413034601/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43979 "Go to next forum topic")
author: eliason

comments.content: Beautiful. When I was younger, I was an A, but since trimming the hair I am closest to the S.
